amla.1. b-sharpe, as a supervised financial i: 1. b-sharpe, as a supervised financial intermediary, complies with Federal Act on Combating Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing (Anti-Money Laundering Act of 10 October 1997, CC 955.0, « AMLA »). Preventing and fighting money laundering is a central element of the legislative framework put in place by regulatory authorities in developed countries. The Anti-Money Laundering Act is designed to prohibit the movement of funds from criminal activities and to eradicate the availability of financing for terrorist activities.
amla.2. b-sharpe undertakes to comply scrupul: 2. b-sharpe undertakes to comply scrupulously with the law and to combat all forms of money laundering, in particular through the service provided by b-sharpe. b-sharpe strictly complies with its duties of due diligence, by taking all necessary measures, including the following:
amla.Verification of the identity of the cust: Verification of the identity of the customer (Art. 3 AMLA);
amla.Establishing the identity of the benefic: Establishing the identity of the beneficial owner (Art. 4 AMLA);
amla.Repetition of the verification of the id: Repetition of the verification of the identity of the customer or the establishment of the identity of the beneficial owner (Art. 5 AMLA);
amla.Special duties of due diligence and clar: Special duties of due diligence and clarification of the economic background and the purpose of a transaction or of a business relationship (Art. 6 AMLA);
amla.Duty to keep and retain records for a mi: Duty to keep and retain records for a minimum of ten years (Art. 7 AMLA).
amla.3. b-sharpe is required by law, when est: 3. b-sharpe is required by law, when establishing business relationships, to verify the identity of the other party on the basis of duly certified and valid supporting documents. When the contracting partner is a legal person, b-sharpe must gather information on the powers to legally bind and represent that legal person and verify the identity of the persons establishing the business relationship on behalf of the legal person.
amla.4. The Customer must provide b-sharpe, s: 4. The Customer must provide b-sharpe, spontaneously or upon request, with any information and document, allowing to identify and clarify the identity of the Customer, the economic beneficiary (s) and the origin of the funds, at the beginning of the relationship or when conducting the repetition of the verification in compliance with the duties of b-sharpe.
amla.5. b-sharpe may require any information: 5. b-sharpe may require any information and / or supporting documentation on the object and purpose of the operation that the Customer wishes to conclude with b-sharpe, in particular on the origin and destination of the funds committed. The extent of the information to be collected will depend on the nature of the transaction or the risk represented by the Customer.
amla.6. b-sharpe may require additional suppo: 6. b-sharpe may require additional supporting documents, in particular to prove the reality and transparency of the commercial operations justifying the exchange transactions.
amla.7. b-sharpe is subject to the following: 7. b-sharpe is subject to the following duties in the event of any suspicion of money laundering:
amla.Duty to report and inform the competent: Duty to report and inform the competent authorities in the event of suspicious transactions or suspicions of money laundering (Art. 9 AMLA);
amla.8. b-sharpe reserves the right to declin: 8. b-sharpe reserves the right to decline to enter into a relationship with a potential customer and / or to refuse to execute a transaction at any stage of the relationship with a customer, if the information provided by the potential customer or existing customer is found to be intentionally false or incomplete or if b-sharpe suspects any link to illegal activities.
amla.9. b-sharpe is also obliged to report an: 9. b-sharpe is also obliged to report any suspicious transactions to the competent authorities and freeze the assets concerned.
amla.10. To the extent permitted by law, b-sh: 10. To the extent permitted by law, b-sharpe has the right to take all the necessary measures to remove any suspicion and proceed, if necessary, to any communication to the competent authorities, as well as to freeze the assets concerned.
amla.11. The collection of information on the: 11. The collection of information on the Customer and the operations he / she wishes to carry out is crucial in order for b-sharpe to comply with the applicable legislation. The collection of information by b-sharpe is based on the document «Data Protection policy ».
amla.12. b-sharpe reserves the right to use t: 12. b-sharpe reserves the right to use the services of a third party to confirm the information gathered. The Client undertakes to inform b-sharpe of any changes subsequent to the opening of the relationship.
amla.13. Due to the applicable legislation, t: 13. Due to the applicable legislation, the information collected must be kept by b-sharpe for a period of ten years after the termination of the business relationship or after the execution of a transaction (Art. 7 para. 3 AMLA).
amla.14. By using b-sharpe's services for ina: 14. By using b-sharpe's services for inappropriate purposes, the Customer may be exposed to criminal prosecution.

data-protection.Provisions regarding the protection of p: Provisions regarding the protection of personal data, use of cookies, and tracking technology
data-protection.1.1. For the purposes of these provision: 1.1. For the purposes of these provisions, the term “personal data” (“personal data” or “data”) refers to all information that relates to an identified or identifiable natural person (“customer,” “user,” or “data subject”).
data-protection.1.2. b-sharpe, Pont-Rouge, Esplanade 2,: 1.2. b-sharpe, Pont-Rouge, Esplanade 2, 1212 Grand-Lancy, Switzerland (UID: CHE-113.223.739) is responsible for the way in which the personal data of its customers is collected, used and protected. b-sharpe has appointed Mr. Julien Dubost as Data Protection Officer.
data-protection.2.1. The protection of privacy, customer: 2.1. The protection of privacy, customer data and financial information is a priority for b-sharpe. This document together with b-sharpe's Terms and Conditions set out the principles on which b-sharpe processes and collects all personal data of its customers.
data-protection.2.2 These provisions describe in detail: 2.2 These provisions describe in detail b-sharpe’s internal policies for obtaining the necessary consent for processing data as well as using data collected by b-sharpe, and the protection and security of data collected. For security reasons, b-sharpe’s internal policies cannot be shared or published. To the extent possible, the b-sharpe Security Officer and the b-sharpe Data Protection Officer are available to answer questions from customers and users concerning b-sharpe’s internal policies (see art. 13 below).
data-protection.3. Confidentiality and compliance with t: 3. Confidentiality and compliance with the applicable laws
data-protection.b-sharpe processes the data collected in: b-sharpe processes the data collected in the strictest confidentiality and in compliance with the applicable laws.
data-protection.By using b-sharpe’s Site, platforms, and: By using b-sharpe’s Site, platforms, and services, the customer or user consents to b-sharpe using the information provided to b-sharpe in its activities and in accordance with these provisions. The Customer confirms that the information provided to b-sharpe is accurate and complete.
data-protection.B. Collection and processing of data: B. Collection and processing of data
data-protection.5.1 b-sharpe collects and processes data: 5.1 b-sharpe collects and processes data and information from customers or potential customers when they open an account and/or use b-sharpe’s platforms or services. In addition, b-sharpe collects and processes personal data it receives directly from its customers as part of the contractual relationship. In particular, b-sharpe collects the following personal data:
data-protection.Personal identification information (inc: Personal identification information (including, for example, full name, date of birth, age, nationality, gender, signature, bills, photographs, telephone number, postal address, and email address);
data-protection.Financial data (including, for example,: Financial data (including, for example, account/contract number, other account information);
data-protection.Data on transactions and the financial b: Data on transactions and the financial background of transactions and contractual relationships;
data-protection.Data necessary for effective marketing (: Data necessary for effective marketing (including, for example, preferences for the use of services offered);
data-protection.Data collected when accessing content on: Data collected when accessing content on the Site/platform (including, for example, date and time of access, IP address, cookies, etc.);
data-protection.Data allowing identification of the cust: Data allowing identification of the customer, the control person and/or the financial beneficiary in accordance with the document “Fight against money laundering.
data-protection.5.2 Subject to the prior explicit or imp: 5.2 Subject to the prior explicit or implicit consent of the parties concerned, b-sharpe is entitled to record telephone conversations for security reasons or for documentation purposes.
data-protection.5.3 b-sharpe may also receive informatio: 5.3 b-sharpe may also receive information from banks and financial institutions used by its customers to transfer money when using b-sharpe's services or from business partners (including, for instance, partners specialising in criminal background checks, verification of identity or political exposure, credit bureaus, etc.).
data-protection.5.4 b-sharpe also collects personal data: 5.4 b-sharpe also collects personal data from publicly accessible sources (including, for instance, debt collection registers, land registers, commercial registers, press, Internet, etc.).
data-protection.5.5 In the event that b-sharpe requires: 5.5 In the event that b-sharpe requires certain information to provide services and, upon request, a user fails to provide the information, b-sharpe may not be able to offer its services to the user.
data-protection.6.1 b-sharpe processes the personal data: 6.1 b-sharpe processes the personal data of its customers in compliance with the applicable laws, in particular for the following reasons:
data-protection.To offer its services (including, for ex: To offer its services (including, for example, registration on the platform and creation of a customer profile);
data-protection.To fulfill its obligations to customers: To fulfill its obligations to customers and business partners;
data-protection.To optimize, develop and administer the: To optimize, develop and administer the Site, the platform, and its services;
data-protection.To inform its customers of changes in it: To inform its customers of changes in its services;
data-protection.To comply with legal and regulatory requ: To comply with legal and regulatory requirements such as, for example, obligations arising from the Money Laundering Act (see the document “Anti-Money Laundering”);
data-protection.To exercise its rights and form a defens: To exercise its rights and form a defense related to litigation and judicial or administrative proceedings.
data-protection.6.2 Where prior consent by the customer: 6.2 Where prior consent by the customer or user is required by law for processing data, b-sharpe will obtain consent before it begins processing the data. If consent is not given, b-sharpe may not be able to provide services to the customer or user.
data-protection.6.3 Insofar as the processing of data is: 6.3 Insofar as the processing of data is subject to the General Data Protection Regulation of the European Union (GDPR), the legal grounds for the data processing shall be the following:
data-protection.Where it is necessary to process data in: Where it is necessary to process data in the performance of a contract to which the data subject is a party, or in the performance of pre-contractual action undertaken at the data subject’s request;
Where it is necessary to process data in order to comply with a legal obligation to which b-sharpe is subject;
Where it is necessary to process data in the pursuit of legitimate interests by b-sharpe or a third party, unless the interests or fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject prevails;
data-protection.Where the data subject has consented to: Where the data subject has consented to processing his or her personal information for one or more specific purposes.
data-protection.7.1 Potential customers and interested p: 7.1 Potential customers and interested persons can subscribe to the newsletter on the Site by providing the personal information requested in the online form. Customers and users will be required to confirm the validity of their email address by clicking on a confirmation link that will be sent to the email address provided (double opt-in confirmation). Customer information is captured only after the email address has been confirmed.
data-protection.7.2 b-sharpe customers are automatically: 7.2 b-sharpe customers are automatically subscribed to the newsletter. They are also subscribed to communications regarding services. The purpose of these communications is to notify customers of:
data-protection.Temporary or permanent changes or interr: Temporary or permanent changes or interruptions in b-sharpe's services, applications or software;
data-protection.New features or updates to b-sharpe's se: New features or updates to b-sharpe's services, applications or software;
data-protection.And changes to b-sharpe's Terms and Cond: And changes to b-sharpe's Terms and Conditions or other terms of use.
data-protection.7.3 b-sharpe collects, via its e-mail di: 7.3 b-sharpe collects, via its e-mail distribution service, information concerning persons subscribed to the newsletter, including IP address, date, and time of subscription. The data collected will only be used to send newsletters. The newsletters contain codes allowing b-sharpe to track statistics, including open rate and click rate.
data-protection.7.4 Depending on information needs, b-sh: 7.4 Depending on information needs, b-sharpe may transmit newsletters on the basis of geographical distribution, which is deduced from the IP address.
data-protection.7.5 Customers and users may unsubscribe: 7.5 Customers and users may unsubscribe from newsletters at any time either by clicking the unsubscribe link contained in the newsletters or directly on the Site. b-sharpe customers may not unsubscribe from communications concerning services, or communications concerning the establishment and execution of b-sharpe’s contractual or legal obligations.
data-protection.8.1 Customers who have registered with b: 8.1 Customers who have registered with b-sharpe but have not finalized their registration will receive reminder emails from b-sharpe. These emails are automatically sent based on timestamp information and open status. This reminder is sent via the email distribution service.
data-protection.8.2 Reminder emails can be stopped at an: 8.2 Reminder emails can be stopped at any time by clicking on the unsubscribe link contained in the emails or directly on the Site.
data-protection.9.1 b-sharpe uses cookies, plug-ins, tra: 9.1 b-sharpe uses cookies, plug-ins, tracking pixels and other technology on its platforms and in connection with certain communications with customers and potential customers, to improve the operation of its sites, to optimize the online and mobile user experience, and to produce more targeted and higher quality online advertising campaigns.
data-protection.9.2 In some cases, third parties may col: 9.2 In some cases, third parties may collect anonymized data about the use of b-sharpe platforms and make this data (in anonymized form) available to b-sharpe, in order to enable b-sharpe to determine:
data-protection.Geographic regions from which users acce: Geographic regions from which users accessed the platforms;
data-protection.The names of the sites that display b-sh: The names of the sites that display b-sharpe ads;
data-protection.and user behavior regarding b-sharpe ads: and user behavior regarding b-sharpe ads posted on other sites.
data-protection.9.3 As it relates to these provisions, t: 9.3 As it relates to these provisions, the terms “cookie," “plug-in,” and “tracking pixel” have the following definitions:
data-protection.A cookie is a small text file often cont: A cookie is a small text file often containing a unique session ID sent by the webserver to the user’s web browser that can be sent back to the server each time the browser asks the server to open a web page. Cookies allow a site to recognize the user’s device. Some cookies are strictly necessary for b-sharpe’s platforms’ proper functioning and to ensure full use of b-sharpe’s services. b-sharpe uses cookies created and implemented by its IT department as well as third-party cookies created by service providers. The cookies used and the purposes for which they are used are listed in the table below.
data-protection.A plug-in is software that adds a specif: A plug-in is software that adds a specific functionality or type of content to a website or mobile application. On its platforms, b-sharpe uses the social media plug-ins listed in the table below to allow access to profile pages on third-party social media platforms. By clicking on a social media plug-in, the user acknowledges that he or she is leaving the b-sharpe platform to access a third-party social media platform that may collect, use, and/or share his or her data according to the privacy policy of the relevant third-party social media platform.
data-protection.A tracking pixel is a piece of code used: A tracking pixel is a piece of code used to collect and communicate information to online advertisers about using b-sharpe platforms, such as pages visited or interaction with those pages. Tracking pixels allow the user’s browser to automatically establish a connection with an online advertiser’s server. The latter is thus informed of the user’s access to one of b-sharpe’s platforms. This ensures that advertising campaigns are relevant to users’ interests. If the user is identified by an online advertiser using tracking pixels, the online advertiser may correlate the visit to one of b-sharpe’s platforms with the visit to a third-party site. b-sharpe has no control over the extent to which online advertisers use the data collected through tracking pixels. For more information on this subject, consult the privacy notices accessible via the links indicated in the table below.
data-protection.9.4 b-sharpe does not collect any data b: 9.4 b-sharpe does not collect any data by means of cookies, pixels, plug-ins or other tracking technology, unless the user has explicitly agreed to such tracking via the consent manager displayed when first accessing b-sharpe’s platforms. Privacy settings can be changed at any time either via the cookie button on websites or via personal settings in mobile applications. Cookies strictly necessary for proper functioning of b-sharpe’s platforms do not require user consent (see GDPR Art. 6.1. (f )) because this processing is necessary to preserve legitimate interests.
data-protection.9.5 Cookies and tracking technology used: 9.5 Cookies and tracking technology used (b-sharpe cannot guarantee that these links are the most current):
data-protection.Link to the supplier’s privacy informati: Link to the supplier’s privacy information
data-protection.Tracking technology is necessary to oper: Tracking technology is necessary to operate certain basic features of b-sharpe’s website and web and mobile applications. This technology does not require the consent of b-sharpe’s website and platforms users.
data-protection.Tracking technology allows b-sharpe to d: Tracking technology allows b-sharpe to determine the number of visitors, how they interact with b-sharpe’s platforms, and evaluate which content is performing well and which needs improvement. This technology also allows b-sharpe to determine which channels brought visitors to b-sharpe’s platforms, thus allowing b-sharpe to analyze and improve the performance of advertising campaigns.
data-protection.9.6 Unless otherwise stated in art. 11 b: 9.6 Unless otherwise stated in art. 11 below, the data collected through cookies and tracking technology is stored and used by b-sharpe for one year. With respect to data collected by third parties, the privacy policies listed above apply.
data-protection.10.1 b-sharpe may supply collected data: 10.1 b-sharpe may supply collected data to third parties within the limits permitted by law. In particular:
data-protection.To business partners, if necessary for d: To business partners, if necessary for data processing as described in art. 6 above (including, for example, service providers such as advertising agencies, computer specialists, database providers, backup and recovery specialists, email providers or call centers, etc.);
data-protection.To any Swiss or foreign authority entitl: To any Swiss or foreign authority entitled to receive data based on a request or an enforceable judgment, as well as any entity authorized as part of an audit and review, or any custodian bank or corresponding third party authorized by b-sharpe that requires the data for the fulfillment of its own obligations, but in these situations, only to the extent required by law.
data-protection.10.2 The above-mentioned business partne: 10.2 The above-mentioned business partners must meet b-sharpe’s information handling and security standards. The information provided will only be that which is necessary for the purposes of their services.
data-protection.10.3 Information will not be sold to thi: 10.3 Information will not be sold to third parties for marketing purposes.
data-protection.11.1 b-sharpe has the right to store cus: 11.1 b-sharpe has the right to store customer and user data in whatever format it chooses, particularly electronic format.
data-protection.11.2 Digital data collected is stored on: 11.2 Digital data collected is stored on b-sharpe’s servers in Switzerland.
data-protection.11.3 b-sharpe will keep the collected da: 11.3 b-sharpe will keep the collected data as long as necessary, for the purposes for which it was collected, i.e., to offer its services. Furthermore, b-sharpe will keep the collected data as long as necessary to fulfill legal and regulatory obligations (see for example the document “Anti-Money Laundering”), as long as claims could be made against b-sharpe and as long as the legitimate interest of the parties concerned, including data security, so requires. After this period, the data will be deleted.
data-protection.C. Rights of persons concerned and final: C. Rights of persons concerned and final provisions
data-protection.12.1 As a rule, persons concerned by b-s: 12.1 As a rule, persons concerned by b-sharpe’s processing of personal data, can exercise the following rights:
data-protection.Request the data that b-sharpe has colle: Request the data that b-sharpe has collected on the user-requester
data-protection.Request that b-sharpe modify, if necessa: Request that b-sharpe modify, if necessary, the data that b-sharpe has collected on the user-requester
data-protection.Request that b-sharpe delete, if necessa: Request that b-sharpe delete, if necessary, the data that b-sharpe has collected on the user-requester
data-protection.Request that b-sharpe restrict processin: Request that b-sharpe restrict processing the user-requester’s data
data-protection.Object to b-sharpe processing the user-r: Object to b-sharpe processing the user-requester’s data.
data-protection.12.2 Exercise of these rights requires t: 12.2 Exercise of these rights requires that the data subject prove his or her identity with certainty.
data-protection.12.3 If a user believes that b-sharpe ha: 12.3 If a user believes that b-sharpe has violated the data protection law, the user has the right to file a complaint with the competent authority in his or her country. As a first step, the user is urged to inform b-sharpe of his or her intention to file a complaint in order to give b-sharpe an opportunity to address any possible error.
data-protection.For all questions regarding personal dat: For all questions regarding personal data protection, b-sharpe has appointed Mr. Julien Dubost as Data Protection Officer. Requests in this regard can be directed to b-sharpe SA’s address: Pont-Rouge, Esplanade 2, 1212 Grand-Lancy, Switzerland or go to

legal-notice.Anyone who views the information publish: Anyone who views the information published on the b-sharpe SA website (hereinafter "b-sharpe") at www.b-sharpe.com and/or www.b-sharpe.ch is responsible for providing and maintaining the means by which they access the Site, including in particular the necessary computer equipment (hardware and software) as well as an Internet connection.
legal-notice.This person is responsible for access in: This person is responsible for access in addition to all costs necessary for connecting to the Site, and this person assumes all risks associated with the use and storage of connection information on the computer equipment or server used to access the Site and its services.
legal-notice.This person shall take all necessary pre: This person shall take all necessary precautions to ensure that the Site is not exposed to computer viruses such as worms or Trojan horses or any other dangerous and/or inappropriate equipment or devices.
legal-notice.If a virus or other malicious device is: If a virus or other malicious device is deemed to have been transmitted to the Site from the Client's IP address, b-sharpe reserves the right to terminate the Client's account, and the Client shall be liable for the costs of removing such viruses and repairing the damage in addition to any other costs which b-sharpe may incur as a result of the Client's malicious or negligent behaviour, however slight.
legal-notice.As such, he or she accepts the following: As such, he or she accepts the following conditions :
legal-notice.The content published on the b-sharpe we: The content published on the b-sharpe website is for information purposes only. They constitute no incitement, offer or recommendation to conduct transactions.
legal-notice.b-sharpe assumes no responsibility for t: b-sharpe assumes no responsibility for the completeness and accuracy of the information contained on the site, nor for any damage resulting from actions taken on the basis of information contained in this publication or any other b-sharpe publication.
legal-notice.b-sharpe expressly reserves the right to: b-sharpe expressly reserves the right to modifiy its prices or the configuration of services offered at any time. It is expressly stated that the b-sharpe website offers no advice.
legal-notice.Opinions and other information do not co: Opinions and other information do not constitute decision-making aids for legal, tax or other matters.
legal-notice.The b-sharpe website is not intended for: The b-sharpe website is not intended for legal or natural persons who, by virtue of their nationality, corporate headquarters, domicile or for any other reason, are subject to a legal system which prohibits or limits in particular the publication of content, access to the b-sharpe website or the activities of a foreign financial service provider such as those provided by b-sharpe.
legal-notice.Access to the b-sharpe website is prohib: Access to the b-sharpe website is prohibited to persons subject to these restrictions.
legal-notice.Please inform yourself on the legal syst: Please inform yourself on the legal system applicable in your country.
legal-notice.By clicking on links on www.b-sharpe.com: By clicking on links on www.b-sharpe.com and/or www.b-sharpe.ch, you may be leaving the site.
legal-notice.b-sharpe has not verified the sites whic: b-sharpe has not verified the sites which are hyperlinked to b-sharpe.com and/or www.b-sharpe.ch, and declines any responsibility for the content, products and services or for any other offers published there.
legal-notice.b-sharpe collects and uses information i: b-sharpe collects and uses information in order to conduct its activities. For more details on how b-sharpe processes data, please see our "Data Protection" page.
legal-notice.We'd like to draw our users' attention t: We'd like to draw our users' attention to the fact that they can make an additional contribution to data security by ensuring that they choose a complex password and avoid making it public (in particular, please avoid storing this password in a file on your computer).
legal-notice.All information and analyses published o: All information and analyses published on www.b-sharpe.com and www.b-sharpe.ch are the property of b-sharpe, the service provider or the third party who makes this information available to said service provider or b-sharpe. Viewing, reproducing, saving or using part or all of the information on www.b-sharpe.com and/or www.b-sharpe.ch is authorised solely for personal use. Copyright information, brand names and other legally protected designations may not be modified or deleted. The reproduction or use of part or all of the content for public or business purposes is subject to the prior written approval of b-sharpe.
legal-notice.Any legal relationship between b-sharpe: Any legal relationship between b-sharpe and users of the b-sharpe website is governed by Swiss law.
legal-notice.The exclusive place of jurisdiction is a: The exclusive place of jurisdiction is at b-sharpe SA's corporate headquarters.

new-operation.btn-receive-money-description: Receive your salary or other payments
new-operation.send-money-subtitle: Enter the amount you want to exchange or the amount your beneficiary should receive.
new-operation.beneficiary-step-subtitle: Select the bank account where you want to send the money.
new-operation.receive-money-subtitle: Tell us more about the money you are expecting
new-operation.receive-money-info: How does it work? You want to receive money from a third party in a specific currency but you don't have a bank account in that currency. We can receive it, exchange it, and transfer the money to you. If you want to receive your salary, don't forget to provide the employer document to your employer first.
new-operation.receive-money-disclaimer: We only accept money from one of the following third parties:
new-operation.disclaimer-current-rate-not-lock: *These values are provided for indicative purposes. Upon receipt of funds, we will inform you of the applied exchange rate and the amount you will receive.
new-operation.disclaimer-current-rate-not-lock-buy: *These values are provided for indicative purposes. We will inform you of the applied exchange rate and the amount to send as soon as possible.
new-operation.tooltip-lock-rate: During our opening hours and for certain currencies, we can lock the current rate for you regardless of market fluctuations.
new-operation.lock-rate-modal-available-info: We guarantee you the current rate. On your side, you commit to send us the funds within 48 working hours.
new-operation.lock-rate-modal-unavailable-info: Rate locking is available Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm except Swiss public holidays.
new-operation.disclaimer-send-funds: b-sharpe will not deduct money from your account.
new-operation.disclaimer-ask-funds: Don't forget to ask your {{sourceFunds}} to add your reference as "Payment Reason"/"Message to the beneficiary". Otherwise, this can cause significant processing delays.
new-operation.make-transfer: Open your e-banking and make a transfer of exactly {{amount}} {{currency}} to b-sharpe's {{currency}} account below
new-operation.ask-transfer: Ask your {{sourceFunds}} to transfer the {{amount}} {{currency}} on b-sharpe {{currency}} account below.
new-operation.no-forget-reference: Don’t forget to include your reference as "Reason for payment"/"Message for the beneficiary". Not including those will cause important delays.
new-operation.thank-modal-subtitle-success: Your money is on its way!💸
new-operation.thank-modal-subtitle-later: Don't forget to send us your money!
new-operation.thank-modal-subtitle-later-rate-locked: Don't forget to send us your money within 48 hours!
new-operation.thank-modal-receive-title: We are waiting for your money!
new-operation.thank-modal-buy-rate-no-lock: We will inform you ASAP of the amount to send.
new-operation.modal-confirm-buy-no-real-rate-content: We cannot provide a rate for this operation right now. If you confirm anyway, it means that you accept the rate that we will give you. Otherwise, you can contact our trading team to lock the rate.
new-operation.document-legal-reason: For legal reasons, we need a document explaining the reason for this operation. This can be an invoice or a contract.

rib-updated.alert: To continue enjoying our services, please update our IBAN.
rib-updated.modal-subtitle: Urgent: Take a quick look at your 'IBAN & Documents' section to make sure you're using the latest b-Sharpe IBAN. We noticed you used an outdated IBAN for your last transfer. Our banking partner will have to return any funds sent to this old IBAN and b-Sharpe won't be able to receive and process your next transaction. Please update our information as soon as possible to avoid delays.
rib-updated.modal-text-1: Select the currency you wish to exchange and copy the new IBAN.
rib-updated.modal-text-2: Add the new IBAN to your own online bank account.
rib-updated.modal-text-3: You can now send us your funds, and we will convert them as usual!
rib-updated.modal-alert: You can reach us at +41 22 311 11 82 from Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm.

account.finish-setup: {{firstName}}, Finish setting up your account to unlock all features.
account.delete-account-warning: Deleting your account will lock your access to b-sharpe. If you haven't performed any operations so far, we will erase your data. If you have performed at least one operation, we will deactivate your account and retain your data for legal reasons.
account.reason-input-info: Sad to see you go. Could you tell us more about why you want to delete your account?
account.type-input-info: To delete your account, type DELETE in the field below.
account.password-change-success-message: Thank you, your password has been changed.
account.logout-modal-title: Are you sure you want to log out?
account.further-modification-info: For further modifications, please contact our customer service by clicking on the help button at the top right of your screen.
account.delete-reason-no-longer-need: I no longer need to exchange currency.
account.delete-reason-exchange-specific: My need for currency exchange was specific (real estate purchase...).
account.delete-reason-cheaper-service: I found a cheaper service (fees, margin...).
account.delete-reason-not-satisfied: I am not satisfied with the service (too slow, too complex).
account.delete-reason-not-suit-need: The service does not suit my needs (need for a bank account or a bank card...).
account.profile-details-change-hint: You cannot change your profile in the app. If you need to do so, please contact support.
account.delete-account-message: Do you really want to delete your account? You will no longer be able to use b-sharpe's services after this.
account.delete-account-success-message: Your request has been successfully processed. We will inform you as soon as your account is deleted. This may take up to 7 business days.

simulator.title: Simulator
simulator.subtitle: Get an idea of the amount you or your beneficiary will receive.
simulator.simulator-tooltip-rate: Exchange rate subject to market variations and conditions

help.title: Help
help.share-feedback: 📝 Share your feedback and help us improve
help.call-modal-subtitle: You can reach us at {{phone}} from Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm.
help.bsharpe-team-title: Our team is here to help you
help.contact-call-schedule: Call us from Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm
help.contact-by-email: Or send us an email at
help.help-description: Our customer service is available Monday to Friday from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm.

history.title: Operations History
history.no-operations:
You have no operations at the moment. 
Click on "New operation" to create one
history.repeat-operation-info-text: Use "Repeat this operation" if you need to create the exact same operation again.
history.customer-service-info-text: Our customer service will contact you as soon as possible to inform you of the amount to send. Once done, you will need to transfer the funds to b-sharpe. Here is
history.wait-receipt-funds-info-text: Upon receipt of the funds, we will inform you of the exchange rate applied and the amount you will receive. Here is
history.realtime-info-text: We will proceed with the operation you specified upon receipt of your funds. Don't forget to send us the funds if you haven't already. Here is
history.employer-document-start-link: If you haven't already, you can download the
history.employer-document-end-link: and send it to your employer.
history.cancel-operation-modal-info:
Are you sure you want to cancel this operation?
If you have already sent the funds, please contact the trading team at fx@b-sharpe.com
history.buy-not-realtime-success-description: Our team will contact you as soon as possible to inform you of the amount to send to us.
history.transaction-detail-status-tooltip-comple: Your funds have been transferred to the bank account below.
history.detail-amount-message: Upon receipt of the funds, we will inform you of the exchange rate applied and the amount you will receive.

iban-documents.title: IBAN and Documents
iban-documents.select-currency-to-view-documents: Choose the currency you’re sending and we’ll show you b-Sharpe's bank details and any helpful documents
iban-documents.how-send-psp: Here are our bank details if you send us {{currency}}. You'll need to use your bank to transfer your funds to b-Sharpe.
iban-documents.how-send-vban: Here are your new nominative Swiss IBAN if you send us {{currency}}. You'll need to use your bank to transfer your funds to b-sharpe.
iban-documents.reminder-include-reference: Don’t forget to include your reference as "Reason for payment"/"Message for the beneficiary". Not including those will cause important delays.
iban-documents.no-iban-for-currency: We couldn't find any bank details for {{currency}}. Please contact support for help.

qr-bill-modal.reminder-credit-suisse: If you are a Credit Suisse customer, don't forget to uncheck the box 'I am paying on behalf of someone else'

common.reference-to-use: Reference to use in your transfer
common.error-occurred: An error occurred, please contact us

rewards.referral-details-receive: 🎉 Thanks to your rewards, <strong>you will receive {{amount}} more<strong> on your account.
rewards.referral-details-send: 🎉 Thanks to your rewards, <strong>you will send {{amount}} less<strong> from your account.
rewards.referral-details-2: 🏦 With our preferential rate, you save approximately {{amount}} compared to a traditional bank.

referral.coupon-explanation: After {{total}} CHF of accumulated exchange with b-sharpe, you will receive a coupon to benefit from a reduction of {{amount}} CHF on your next transaction.
referral.form-title: Create your account and start saving on your currency exchange.
referral.start-save-money-description: b-sharpe is a simple solution for changing money in over 20 currencies. Our preferential rate allows savings on transfers, that's why {{name}} recommends us.
referral.easy-process-description: b-sharpe is very easy to use. You send us the funds to be exchanged and we send them back to you in the right currency. It's as simple as that.
referral.our-word: Don't just take our word for it
referral.our-word-description: We already have tons of satisfied customers! Here are some numbers.
referral.modal-first-screen-text: You receive 30 CHF once they have exchanged 4000 CHF.
referral.modal-second-screen-text: Invite your friends to join b-sharpe by sharing your link. When one of your friends reaches a total of 4,000 CHF exchanged, they receive 20 CHF and you receive 30 CHF to use on your next operation.
referral.modal-second-screen-text-mobile:
Share your link with your friends
They create their b-sharpe account
They perform operations up to a total of 4,000 CHF
You receive a credit of 30 CHF*
They receive a credit of 20 CHF*.

 * To use on their next operation
referral.modal-last-screen-subtitle: You can invite your friends by
referral.modal-scan-qr-code: Asking them to scan this QR code
referral.modal-send-invite: Sending them your invitation link by email
referral.no-friends-message: As soon as your first friend signs up, your friends will be listed here and you can track your rewards.
referral.my-pending-invites-info: Waiting for your friends to complete all the steps to credit your wallet
referral.referral-history-info: All your validated friends are visible here
referral.share-title: {{name}} recommends b-sharpe for your currency exchange operations!
referral.invite-friend-description: Invite your friends to use b-sharpe and receive {{benefitAmount}} for their first operation

bank-account.subtitle: These are the bank accounts where you want to receive your money once exchanged. You need to add one before making your first transaction.
bank-account.no-data:
You don't have any bank account at the moment.
Add your first bank account by clicking on "Add a bank account" at the top right.
bank-account.tooltip-pending: This bank account is pending validation. We will inform you as soon as you can use it.
bank-account.add-beneficiary-success-message: Your bank account has been successfully added. You can add it now.
bank-account.add-beneficiary-not-myself-success-messa: Your bank account has been successfully added and is pending validation. We will inform you as soon as you can use it.
bank-account.pending-tooltip: This bank account is pending validation. We will inform you as soon as you can use it.
bank-account.delete-are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to delete this bank account?
bank-account.delete-beneficiary-modal-title: Are you sure you want to delete this beneficiary?

vban.claim-info-box-title: Get even faster CHF transfers with a FREE nominative Swiss IBAN!
vban.claim-info-box-description-item-1: Accepted by all Swiss employers, pensions, Health insurances, and more.
vban.claim-page-title: Speed up CHF transfers with a Swiss IBAN in your name
vban.claim-page-description: Get your own Swiss IBAN to receive CHF from Swiss companies and organisations, change it automatically and receive it in your own bank account (EUR, etc.) without thinking about it.
vban.claim-page-description-list-item-1: It’s accepted by all Swiss employers, Health insurances, etc.
vban.claim-page-description-list-item-2: It allows us to process your money even faster!
vban.claim-page-description-list-item-3: Got just one active recipient account in your name? Perfect! b-sharpe will automatically convert and send your money there - no extra steps needed.
vban.do-it-later: I don’t need one right now
vban.information-page-title: We just need a few more information
vban.information-page-question-1: Have you understood that this Swiss IBAN can only receive CHF?
vban.information-page-question-2: Do you already have a Swiss bank account in CHF in your name?
vban.information-page-question-3: Do you confirm that you’ll only receive money on this IBAN from legitimate Swiss organizations or from a bank account in your name?
vban.information-page-info: We may suspend or close your account if funds received on your nominative IBAN comes from any other sources.
vban.error-creating-vban: Couldn't create your nominative IBAN. Please try again.
vban.field-must-be-set-to-yes: To qualify for a nominative IBAN, please select 'Yes'.

rate-alert.alert-info: Alerts will notify you when your target is reached so you can make your transaction at the best rate.

rate-alert.save-rate-alert-info: Set your alert directly on the chart or enter a value in the field below

Add one by clicking on "Add"

rate-alert.alerts-empty-list: Never miss an opportunity again by receiving an email alert when the desired rate is reached.

login.signin-or-create: Sign in or create an account
login.initial-create-account: Not a customer yet? Create your account

reset-password.email-step-description: Enter your email address to receive instructions on how to reset your password.
reset-password.otp-step-description: We've sent you a 6-digit code to {{email}}. Please enter it below.
reset-password.resend-email-btn: Didn't receive the email? Resend a new one.
reset-password.password-step-description: You'll use this password to log in to b-sharpe
reset-password.password-requirements: Use a minimum of 8 characters, including at least one number and one special character (@$!%* #?&.,-)

forgot-password.title: Forgot Password? You can create a new one here
forgot-password.description: Enter the email address associated with your b-sharpe account.
forgot-password.email-hint: If your email is registered in our system, a code will be sent to you in your email inbox in the next step.

registration.what-type-account: What type of account do you want to create?
registration.download-mobile-app: For a better experience, you can also download the mobile app
registration.password-requirements: Your password must contain at least:
registration.phone-description: Please enter your phone number. You will receive a confirmation code by SMS.
registration.enter-code-description: We have sent an SMS to {{phoneNumber}} containing a 6-digit code. Please enter it below.
registration.resend-code: Didn't receive the SMS? Resend SMS.
registration.use-promocode: Do you have a promo code?
registration.name-description: Please enter your name as it appears on your ID document.
registration.gender-description: Please choose your gender as it appears on your ID document.
registration.birth-date-description: You must be over 18 to create an account.
registration.admin-wait-modal-title: You do not yet have access to this feature
registration.admin-wait-modal-desc: Our teams are currently verifying your supporting documents. You will receive a notification by email when you can access this screen.
registration.complete-your-account-description: There are still a few steps before enjoying all b-sharpe's features. Once all steps are completed, our customer service will activate your account within 24 business hours.
registration.email-confirmation-description: We've sent an email to {{email}} containing a 6-digit code. Please enter it below.
registration.email-confirmation-modal-description: Your email address has been confirmed. You can now proceed with the remaining steps.
registration.proof-of-residence-description: Please upload a proof of address dated within the last 6 months. It can be one of the following documents:
registration.proof-of-residence-item-1: Water, electricity, gas, phone, or internet bill
registration.origin-of-funds-description: Are you the sole owner of the funds that will be sent to us?
registration.whats-your-usage: What will you use b-sharpe for?
registration.whats-your-main-currency: Which currencies do you primarily want to exchange?
registration.whats-your-usage-frequence: How often will you exchange money?
registration.how-much-money: How much money do you plan to exchange each time?
registration.usage-item-1-title: Salary transfer between my bank accounts
registration.usage-item-1-details: You want to transfer your salary from one account to another in a different currency.
registration.usage-item-2-title: Receipt of wages paid by the employer
registration.usage-item-2-details: You don't have a bank account in the currency of your salary. b-sharpe can receive it, exchange it, and transfer it to your bank account.
registration.usage-item-3-title: Payments within a restricted family framework
registration.usage-item-3-details: You can transfer money to your close family in a different currency.
registration.usage-item-4-title: Repatriation of savings or funds linked to social insurance
registration.usage-item-4-details: You want to transfer your savings or funds linked to social insurance to a bank account in a different currency.
registration.usage-item-5-title: Payment of supplier or insurance invoices
registration.usage-item-5-details: You want to pay invoices in a foreign currency.
registration.usage-item-6-details: You want to transfer funds related to a real estate transaction.
registration.us-person-status-tooltip: You do not have US person status
registration.us-person-status-tooltip-description: A US Person is a person of American nationality, an American resident or the holder of a 'green card.'
registration.completed-description:
You've successfully registered!
Our customer service team will validate your registration within 24 working hours. You will receive a notification by e-mail.
registration.identity-verification-pending:
We are currently in the process of verifying your identity.
You can continue with the next steps in complete peace of mind.
registration.us-status-checked: Our services are not available to US citizens or residents of the United States.
registration.proof-of-identity-desc: Get ready! You'll need a valid passport or national identity card with an MRZ code.
registration.reassurance-title: Why do we ask you for this information?
registration.reassurance-email:
At b-sharpe, we are like you and we don't like spam : we only use your email address to send you critical information about your b-sharpe account or rate alerts if you have set any.

If you subscribe to our newsletter we will only send you information that we believe are highly relevant to your needs and we will never share your email address outside b-sharpe without your explicit consent.
registration.reassurance-password:
As a Swiss company, we highly believe in our customer privacy. Your password secures your account and prevents anyone else from accessing it.

We will never ask you for your password!
registration.reassurance-phone: We only use your phone number to secure your account and your operations. You may receive SMS codes to confirm your identity after some critical actions (for example, adding a new beneficiary who will receive your  money).
registration.reassurance-name: We want to provide you with the most efficient and personalised experience (and it's also nice to know who we work with). This is also one of the information that we have to ask to be compliant with international banking regulations.
registration.reassurance-gender: It doesn't matter to us but the regulator asks for it and we have to comply.
registration.reassurance-nationality: We use this information to make your new operations more convenient and faster to book. This is also one of the information that we have to ask to be compliant with international banking regulations.
registration.reassurance-dob: Besides wishing you a happy birthday, we need to make sure that you are an adult! This is also one of the information that we have to ask to be compliant with international banking regulations.
registration.reassurance-proof-address:
Before your very first operation and to protect your interest, we make sure that nobody attempts to impersonate you.
This is also one of the information that we have to ask and keep to be compliant with international banking regulations.
registration.reassurance-origin-funds:
We aim at providing you with the most convenient and cost effective solution to change your money between currencies. If you believe we have missed this mark, you can chat with our team on the bottom right of your screen to explain us your situation.
This is also one of the information that we have to ask to be compliant with international banking regulations.
registration.reassurance-review: These information are used to generate your contract. Please make sure that they are correctly filled.
registration.reassurance-contract: Our contract explains the conditions in which we accept to process your transactions. Should you have any questions while using our services, do not hesitate to contact us and we will do our best to explain it.
registration.reassurance-identity:
Before your very first operation and to protect your interest, we make sure that nobody attempts to impersonate you.
This is also one of the information that we have to ask and keep to be compliant with international banking regulations.
registration.under-18-restricted: b-sharpe is not available to under-18s
registration.sign-up-phone-pop-up: Make sure it's the correct number. We'll send you a verification code via SMS.
registration.step-to-login-screen: You're going back to the login screen. Do you want to continue?
registration.onfido-status-retry-description: Please try again or contact us.
registration.onfido-status-error-title: Unfortunately, we were unable to validate your identity.
registration.onfido-status-error-description: Our support team will get back to you as soon as possible.
registration.email-confirmation-code-description: We've sent you a 6-digit code to the address {{email}}. Please enter it below.
registration.email-confirmation-code-resend-tooltip: Please check your spam folder and ensure there are no errors in your email address.
registration.email-confirmation-code-error-modal-desc: Incorrect code. Enter it again or we can send you a new one.
registration.admin-action-message: Your request has been submitted successfully, we'll send you an email once it's processed.
registration.sign-up-receive-new-agreement: I agree to receive the b-sharpe newsletter via email.
registration.step-1-street-pop-up: Make sure to provide your primary residential address, for which you will need to provide proof of residence.
registration.accept-contract-tooltip: You must complete the other sections before you can sign your contract

registration-corporate.title: Creating your business account
registration-corporate.form-about-title: How did you hear about us?
registration-corporate.form-agreement: By registering, you accept our terms and conditions and acknowledge the accuracy of the information provided.

registration-remaining-steps.stepper-title-not-completed: Complete your profile to access all features
registration-remaining-steps.stepper-title-completed: Our team is verifying your profile. You will receive an email notification once your profile is validated.
registration-remaining-steps.alert-box-desc-info-required: Welcome to b-sharpe! To start exchanging your funds and comply with banking regulations, we need you to complete some additional information. In the meantime, you can still explore our app, set up rate alerts, invite your friends, and more.

doc_select.subtitle: We cannot accept pictures of screens and photocopies.

welcome.list_header_webcam: Use your phone to take a picture of:

error.error-http-timeout: The server took timed out, please try again.
error.error-http-connection: The server appears to be unavailable at the moment.
error.error-http-server: Something seems to be wrong with our server. We have been notified. Please try again later.
error.error-http-forbidden: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
error.error-profiles-402: An error occurred, please contact us
error.error-profiles-404: Server error while loading your profile
error.error-min-iban-length: IBAN must have a minimum of {{min}} characters
error.error-sign-in-manually: You need to sign in manually
error.error-unsafe-password-message:
Please check your password matches these rules:
- length is at least 8 characters
- password is not included in your last name, first name or e-mail
- password is not too common
error.error-wrong-otp-code: The verification code seems to be incorrect. Please correct it and try again.
error.error-upload-document: The server cannot accept your file. Please try to upload another.
error.error-open-app-in-store: Sorry, there was an unexpected error, you need to open the application in the store manually
error.error-user-already-exists: This email is already in use by a b-sharpe account.
error.error-bad-credentials: Username not found or password didn't match.
error.error-password-symbols: At least one number or special character
error.error-biometry-unavailable: {{sensor}} currently unavailable. Please try again later
error.error-iban-already-exist: A beneficiary with this IBAN already exists.
error.error-biometry-not-enrolled: You should setup biometrics in your device settings

pair-currency.description:
Follow the evolution of your favorite currencies!
The displayed rate is the interbank rate and does not include b-sharpe's margin
